comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: SMS Prinz Adalbert, armored cruiser of the Imperial German Navy, torpedoed and sunk 23 October 1915 see en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SMS_Prinz_Adalbert_%281901%29 NB: Namesake of the ship was NOT Prince Adalbert of Prussia (1884–1948), the son of Kaiser Wilhelm II, as the English wikipedia indicates, but Prince Adalbert of Prussia (1811–1873), the founder of the German fleet.

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: B-59:  Thank you for the details about this German Navy ship.  We will add more information when we update the description.
